dublin_core.dcvalue: Maria Freytsis CNM MPH Director of Global Initiatives Maternity Neighborhood gave this presenation at the December 12 2013 meeting of the mHealth Working Group It covers her review paper of mHealth tools for neonatal health and Maternity Neighborhood s work in global health The paper is mHealth for Midwives A Call to Action Anna Maria Speciale CNM MSc Maria Freytsis CNM MPH Journal of Midwifery Women s Health 2013 58 76 82 c 2013 by the American College of Nurse Midwives www jmwh org
Mobile Tools for Health Workers Targeting Neonatal Health in Low-Resource Settings
